flowRoot.style: font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;font-weight:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-size:16px;line-height:20px;font-family:'Nimbus Roman No9 L';-inkscape-font-specification:'Nimbus Roman No9 L, Normal';font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-feature-settings:normal;text-align:start;letter-spacing:0px;word-spacing:0px;writing-mode:lr-tb;text-anchor:start;fill:#000000;fill-opacity:1;stroke:none;stroke-width:1px;stroke-linecap:butt;stroke-linejoin:miter;stroke-opacity:1
